title: STAT+: Corvus pill shows promise in early-stage eczema trial
description: An eczema pill in development from Corvus Pharmaceuticals helped improve patients' skin in an early study.
content: An eczema pill in development from Corvus Pharmaceuticals helped improve patients' skin in an early study.
